import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Contact = ({ contact }) => { return (

{contact.name.substring(0, 15)}

{contact.title}

{contact.email.substring(0, 20)}

{contact.address}

{contact.phone}

{contact.status === 'Active' ? : } {contact.status}

) } export default Contact
